backend/main.mo: Main canister logic for creating, storing, listing, viewing, deleting, and downloading text or PDF notes using a map-backed store.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old text-only notes into the new union type format by wrapping content as text.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI and query changes to specific frontend files and components for PDF-note support.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files related to notes, UI, and PDF support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and color tokens defining light/dark themes with custom OKLCH palette variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file setting title, fonts, and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router, theme provider, and routes for learning and note pages.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing contact details, navigation links, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and route links for learning and notes pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, downloading, and deleting notes through the backend actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styling, and component-level styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPythonPage.tsx: Renders a landing page for Python learning with hero content, navigation buttons, and tabbed introductory lessons.
Displays a single note, supports PDF viewing and downloading, and provides deletion with confirmation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Notes/NotesListPage.t: Shows a list of all notes with loading and error states, and includes actions to view, upload, or delete notes.
React page providing text and PDF note upload forms with validation, file handling, and submission via custom mutation hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, and architectural notes for the Python notes website.
